greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 2^n mod pi(n).
link: Michael De Vlieger, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..10000
program: (PARI) for(n=2, 100, print1(lift(Mod(2^n, primepi(n))), ", ")) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Dec 10 2018
(MAGMA) [2^n mod #PrimesUpTo(n): n in [2..100]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Dec 10 2018
(Sage) [mod(2^n, prime_pi(n)) for n in (2..100)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Dec 10 2018
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Aug 12 2002
